xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 04 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <vshivam> has joined #ccm 09:46 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 09:59 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:16 <sdumitriu> https://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/-WlD5y-opMqNhaZ9uxRQOe8zGnfm-HDAykh0uokc7yM?feat=directlink 10:27 <ravigarg27> nice :) 10:27 <sdumitriu> There were 3 more after that, in the last 10 minutes 10:28 <ravigarg27> but as in is that accepted? 10:29 <sdumitriu> Yes 10:30 <ravigarg27> ok nice so around 40+ applications 10:30 <sdumitriu> 37 10:31 <ravigarg27> :D 10:31 <sdumitriu> 20 in the last day 10:32 <ravigarg27> hehe 10:32 <ravigarg27> lots of work to do for you now then :P 10:33 <sdumitriu> Yep 10:35 <ravigarg27> All the best :D ; Me too waiting for these exams to get over 10:35 <ravigarg27> 1 more week 10:35 <ravigarg27> long week 10:38 <sdumitriu> Well, the hard part is jut beginning 10:39 <sdumitriu> Now you all have to convince us that you deserve a slot 10:39 <sdumitriu> Fight to the death, my minions! 10:39 <sdumitriu> :D 10:44 <ravigarg27> hehe nice I like it, will begin that soon 10:44 <ravigarg27> hmm sry going to dinner 10:44 <ravigarg27> will brb 11:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey 11:32 <sdumitriu> Hey 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> What's up ? 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> So gone through all the applications ? 11:33 <kushalkhandelwal> A big number :) 11:33 <sdumitriu> Hehe, I wish 11:33 <sdumitriu> I've gone through XWiki, but that was easier 11:34 <kushalkhandelwal> How many applications there ? 11:34 <sdumitriu> Writing a blog post with stats 11:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh :) 11:38 <kushalkhandelwal> So you would be ranking proposals ? 12:01 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: 12:01 <kushalkhandelwal> You would be ranking proposals ? Any priority on projects ? 12:18 <sdumitriu> I will 12:20 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm Ok :) 12:46 <kushalkhandelwal> Done with the blog post ? 14:55 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 15:17 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: Done with the blog post ? 15:17 <sdumitriu> Not yet 15:17 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 15:17 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok :) 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> How many applied for the project I applied for ? 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> Form builder ? 15:18 <kushalkhandelwal> Working on something today ? 15:19 <kushalkhandelwal> And tell me a bit about https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/428 16:24 <sdumitriu> https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/Blog/WebHome
